summary: Just what it says: Meet yourself
descriptionHtml:
Just what it says: Meet yourself

[b]Now Version 1.1!!![/b]

[s]You will find a switch in Breezehome.[/s]

You find a chest in Breezehome.
It contains 2 rings:
- Ring Of Ghost
- Ring Of Duplication.

The Ring Of Ghost turns yourself into a ghostish player.
It just adds/removes the ghost effect! No stats/abilities are changed!
Unequipping this ring turns you back to normal player.

The Ring Of Duplication brings a duplicate of you into the game. (As ghost)
It can have strange game behavior and is NOT required to be used!
Use it at your own risk.


You can use it as follower, or perhaps you will also be able to marry yourself.

(Didn\'t test the marriage function yet)
Unequipping the ring disables your duplicate.


This mod maybe doesn\'t work well together with other mods what modify Breezehome.

It\'s just for fun!
It can cause gameplay issues.
So, really:

U.s.e. i.t. a.t. y.o.u.r. o.w.n. r.i.s.k.!

Known bugs:
- Both rings tell you that they modify your stats.
  Need to remove this info in the next release.
author: Devilmarkus
